subject: Re: Anyone speak/read Japanese?
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
So much for my foreign language recognition!  LOL - this is Chinese.  My son pointed me 
to http://babelfish.altavista.com which translated this page as follows (well, we can get 
the gist from it anyway):

"The spirit searches for the feature article: ASUP installment: Can and the deceased 
person's soul telephone conversation telephone  

21  days ago pastes the article by weirds to 4months  
Recently The Association for the Study of Unexplained Phenomenon (ASUP) stood in theirs 
outline publishes which they researched and developed (to be called with Franks Box 
"Telephone to the Dead") the similar installment (to be able and deceased person's soul 
telephone conversation telephone)."

Doesn't look like anyone has posted replies to this.  But FRANK!  Maybe this means you're 
famous in China too?!?  ;-)

Margaret
